Experiment Method.Assay Method: PCR and RT-PCR with RFLP Analysis

Material used.Material Source: Patients Derived Material and Cell line
Material used.Material Name: Blood samples and Lymphoblastoid Cell Lines
Material used.Description: Blood samples from a PD patient and controls, and EBV-transformed lymphoblastoid cell lines established from peripheral blood lymphocytes.

Readout description.Result Description: Monoallelic expression documented with silencing of the p.Ala53Thr allele in the patientâ€™s lymphoblastoid cell line and blood mRNA.

Basic positive control.Description: Normal control DNA and RNA used for comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Presence of bands corresponding to both alleles in RT-PCR digests.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence of bands corresponding to the mutant allele in RT-PCR digests, indicating monoallelic expression.

Material used.Material Source: Patients Derived Material and Cell line
Material used.Material Name: Blood samples and Lymphoblastoid Cell Lines
Material used.Description: RNA extracted from blood cells and lymphoblastoid cell lines of the patient and controls for mRNA quantification.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased SNCA mRNA levels in the patient (14-35% higher in lymphoblastoid cells and twofold in blood cells) compared to controls, despite silencing of the mutant allele.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple experiments performed with RNA from freshly drawn blood cells from the patient and four different controls.

Basic positive control.Description: RNA from normal control individuals used for comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: SNCA mRNA levels comparable to control individuals (65.1-86.2% of patient levels in lymphoblastoid cells).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: SNCA mRNA levels significantly higher than control individuals (14-35% higher in lymphoblastoid cells, twofold in blood cells).

Material used.Description: Lymphoblastoid cell lines treated with 5-azadC, 4-PBA, and TSA to investigate epigenetic silencing mechanisms.

Readout description.Result Description: Silencing of the p.Ala53Thr allele due to histone modifications, reactivated by 4-PBA and TSA but not by 5-azadC, indicating no DNA methylation involvement.

Basic positive control.Description: Untreated control flask used for comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Presence of bands corresponding to both alleles after treatment.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence of bands corresponding to the mutant allele before treatment, with reactivation after specific treatments.

Material used.Description: DNA from lymphoblastoid cell lines used to analyze methylation status of the SNCA gene CpG island.

Readout description.Result Description: No methylation detected in the CpG island of the SNCA gene in the patient or controls, indicating silencing of p.Ala53Thr is not due to DNA methylation.

Basic positive control.Description: DNA from normal control individuals used for comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No methylation detected in CpG sites.

Material used.Description: Genomic DNA from the patient used for CNV analysis with Affymetrix GeneChip Mapping 250K arrays.

Readout description.Result Description: No amplification or deletion of the SNCA gene detected; two copies of all 19 SNPs present.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Two copies of SNCA gene SNPs detected.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: More or less than two copies of SNCA gene SNPs detected.
